channel.title: TTDS modification
channel.description: Posting this here is probably a bit of a long shot, but I have a TTDS (or DSTT) flashcart that I use with my Nintendo DS Lite. I'd like to be able to modify the interface on the two screens but I can't find any way to decrypt the "TTMenu.dat" file. Does anyone have any experience to share with this?

item.title: TTDS modification
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Posting this here is probably a bit of a long shot, but I have a TTDS (or DSTT) flashcart that I use with my Nintendo DS Lite. I’d like to be able to modify the interface on the two screens but I can’t find any way to decrypt the “TTMenu.dat” file. Does anyone have any experience to share with this?

Read full topic
